page.title: 07THE PRATTLER
page.content: The Heyford village newspaper is called The Prattler. It is printed monthly. The price of The Prattler is 8 pence; it was 6 pence when it started in 1977. On the first page of the June 1985 issue is an article called {The Old Sun shines in Nether Heyford}. This pub has had alterations done to it and they were officially opened on 22nd April 1985 (see page 14). There is also an article on the {Heyford Hornets} (see page 10). The Prattler has 8 pages with about two items on each page. Each month, as well as special items, there there are reports from the village clubs, the church, the chapel, the monthly Parish Council Meeting and a diary of forthcoming events. There is also, normally, a recipe from a village resident - June's recipe is for Caramel Nut Cake.
